directions: Place beef in a slow cooker. Stir cream of mushroom soup, dry onion soup mix, onion, garlic, cremini mushrooms, and ginger ale in a bowl until thoroughly combined and pour the mixture over the beef.
Cover, set slow cooker to High, and cook for 1 hour; turn cooker down to Low and cook for 5 more hours.
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans cream of mushroom soup
1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix
title: Savory Slow Cooker Beef Tips
